market_sentiment_summary: Bullish - Fed dovish signals and strong ETF inflows

news_items.title: Federal Reserve Signals Potential Rate Cuts in Q1 2025
news_items.summary: Fed Chair Powell hints at dovish pivot citing cooling inflation data. Core CPI down to 2.3% YoY. Market expects 25bps cut in March.

news_items.title: Bitcoin ETF Sees Record $1.2B Inflow
news_items.summary: BlackRock IBIT leads with $800M single-day inflow. Total BTC ETF AUM surpasses $50B. Institutional allocation increasing.

trading_implications: Strong bullish signals for BTC and broader crypto market. Consider increasing long exposure.
